targets.query:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"

from(bucket: "github_webhooks")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "check_run")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["action"] == "completed")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["conclusion"] == "failure")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      repo_name: r.repo_name,
      _value: r._value,
    }))
   |> window(every:24h, createEmpty: true)
   |> count()
   |> group(columns: ["repo_name"], mode: "by")

import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"

from(bucket: "github_transformed")
	|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "check_suite")
  |> unique(column: "github_id")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (uint(v: r._time) - uint(v: r._value)) < (1000000000 * 60 * 30) )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      _value: uint(v: r._time) - uint(v: r._value),
      repo_name: r.repo_name,
      _sha: r.sha,
      _link: "https://github.com/oxidecomputer/" + r.repo_name + "/commits/" + r.sha, 
      slug: r.slug,
    })
  )

from(bucket: "github_transformed")
	|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "check_run")
  |> unique(column: "github_id")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (uint(v: r._time) - uint(v: r._value)) < (1000000000 * 60 * 3) )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      _value: uint(v: r._time) - uint(v: r._value),
      repo_name: r.repo_name,
      _sha: r.sha,
      _link: "https://github.com/oxidecomputer/" + r.repo_name + "/commits/" + r.sha, 
      app_slug: r.app_slug,
      _name: r.name,
    })
  )

timeOpened = from(bucket: "github_webhooks")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "issues")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["action"] == "opened")

timeClosed = from(bucket: "github_webhooks")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "issues")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["action"] == "closed")

join(
  tables: {opened:timeOpened, closed:timeClosed},
  on: ["number", "repo_name"]
)
|> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time_closed,
      _value: (uint(v: r._time_closed) - uint(v: r._time_opened)) / uint(v: 1000000),
      duration_string: string(v: duration(v: uint(v: r._time_closed) - uint(v: r._time_opened))),
      repo_name: r.repo_name,
      number: r.number,
      link: "https://github.com/oxidecomputer/" + r.repo_name + "/issues/" + r.number
    })
  )
  |> sort(columns:["_value"], desc: true)

timeOpened = from(bucket: "github_webhooks")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "pull_request")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["action"] == "opened")

timeClosed = from(bucket: "github_webhooks")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "pull_request")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["action"] == "closed")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["merged"] == true)

join(
  tables: {opened:timeOpened, closed:timeClosed},
  on: ["number", "repo_name"]
)
|> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time_closed,
      _value: (uint(v: r._time_closed) - uint(v: r._time_opened)) / uint(v: 1000000),
      duration_string: string(v: duration(v: uint(v: r._time_closed) - uint(v: r._time_opened))),
      repo_name: r.repo_name,
      number: r.number,
      link: "https://github.com/oxidecomputer/" + r.repo_name + "/pull/" + r.number
    })
  )
  |> sort(columns:["_value"], desc: true)
SELECT count(distinct("sha")) FROM "github-webhooks-rp"."push" WHERE $timeFilter AND ("added" !~ /pdfs/ AND "modified" !~ /pdfs/ AND "removed" !~ /pdfs/) GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT count(distinct("sha")) FROM "github-webhooks-rp"."push" WHERE $timeFilter AND ("added" !~ /pdfs/ AND "modified" !~ /pdfs/ AND "removed" !~ /pdfs/) GROUP BY "sender"
SELECT count(distinct("sha")) FROM "github-webhooks-rp"."push" WHERE $timeFilter AND ("added" !~ /pdfs/ AND "modified" !~ /pdfs/ AND "removed" !~ /pdfs/) GROUP BY "repo_name"

import "strings"
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"

from(bucket: "github_webhooks")
	|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "push")
  |> schema.fieldsAsCols()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
        _sender: r.sender,
        message_len: strings.strlen(v: r.message),
        _message: r.message,
        _link: "https://github.com/oxidecomputer/" + r.repo_name + "/commit/" + r.sha,
    })
  )
  |> sort(columns: ["message_len"], desc: true)
  |> limit(n:50, offset: 0)

import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"

from(bucket:"github_webhooks")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "push")
    |> schema.fieldsAsCols()
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r.additions > 0)
    |> group(columns: ["sender"], mode: "by")
    |> sum(column: "additions")
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({ 
        _sender: r.sender,
        additions: r.additions
      }))
    |> sort(columns: ["additions"], desc: true)

import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"

from(bucket:"github_webhooks")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "push")
    |> schema.fieldsAsCols()
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r.deletions > 0)
    |> group(columns: ["sender"], mode: "by")
    |> sum(column: "deletions")
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({ 
        _sender: r.sender,
        deletions: r.deletions
      }))
    |> sort(columns: ["deletions"], desc: true)

from(bucket: "github_webhooks")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "push")
  |> pivot(
    rowKey:["_time"],
    columnKey: ["_field"],
    valueColumn: "_value"
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      _value: r.message,
      _repo_name: r.repo_name,
      _sender: r.sender,
      _sha: r.sha,
      _count: 1,
    })
  )
  |> unique(column: "_sha")
  |> group(columns: ["_value"], mode:"by")
  |> stateCount(
    fn: (r) => r._count == 1,
    column: "count"
  )
  |> max(column: "count")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      count: r.count,
      message: r._value,
    })
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.message !~ /^Updating file content .*pdfs.*/, onEmpty: "drop")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.message !~ /^Updating .*rendered PDF.*/, onEmpty: "drop")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.message !~ /^Run .*make.*/, onEmpty: "drop")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.message !~ /^Creating .*meeting notes.*/, onEmpty: "drop")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.message !~ /^Updating .*meeting notes.*/, onEmpty: "drop")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.message != "Update README Table", onEmpty: "drop")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.message != "docs: Update TOC", onEmpty: "drop")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.message !~ /^Run terraform apply.*/, onEmpty: "drop")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.message !~ /^Merge branch.*/, onEmpty: "drop")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.message != "Update team members", onEmpty: "drop")
  |> sort(columns: ["count"], desc: true)
  |> limit(n:50, offset: 0)

panels.title: top senders with "typo" in their commit messages
